meanings.definition: resembling an eel in appearance or movement
meanings.sent1: The eely creature slithered effortlessly through the water.
meanings.sent2: The snake moved in an eely manner across the ground.
meanings.sent3: The eely fish danced gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent4: Her eely movements on the dance floor mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The eely gymnast twisted and turned with incredible flexibility.

meanings.definition: slippery or slimy like an eel
meanings.sent1: The eely mud made it hard to walk without slipping.
meanings.sent2: The wet rocks were as eely as a fish in the stream.
meanings.sent3: The eely soap slipped out of his hands and into the sink.
meanings.sent4: Her eely smile hid her true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The eely texture of the seaweed made it hard to hold.
